ai-patthana21.31:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.31:0.3_0: On its path, it condemns and so on.
ai-patthana21.31:1.1_0: It is not a cause or condition for the reason for the object,
ai-patthana21.31:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.31:2.1_0: or causes, without reason, a cause or condition for the sake of paths,
ai-patthana21.31:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.31:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
